function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Degradation of indoor conditions leading to decreased productivity","Impact":"Decreased worker productivity and performance","Mitigation":"Improvement of indoor air quality, thermal conditions, lighting, ergonomics, and acoustics","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, ergonomic furniture, smart lighting systems","People":"Office workers","Owner":"Building management, employers"},{"Description":"Increased sick leaves and presenteeism due to unhealthy buildings","Impact":"Loss of productivity, financial losses for companies","Mitigation":"Improvement of indoor conditions to reduce building-related illnesses","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, ventilation systems, building maintenance protocols","People":"Office workers, employers","Owner":"Building management, employers"}]}
